beans.description:
This adaptor does the following...
* reads DOXML from a file * converts to DataObjects (legacy data structures from previous openadaptor versions) * converts DataObjects to map * converts map to xml * writes to file
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure something that needs to receive the legacy DataObject format.
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config doxml_reader.xml -bean Adaptor
For this example to run correctly you need to download the legacy openadaptor.jar from openadaptor 1.7.2.2 or later. This is available from http://www.openadaptor.org. Ensure that the legacy openadaptor.jar is at the end of your classpath and that your classpath does not include openadaptor-stub.jar.
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar <legacy openadaptor>/openadaptor.jar
writes output to stdout.
